title: NFL Playoffs Prediction Markets - Kalshi vs Polymarket

blocks.markdown: Live tracking of NFL playoff prediction markets across **Kalshi** (CFTC-regulated) and **Polymarket** (crypto-based). Compare odds, liquidity, and market efficiency in real-time.
Super Bowl winner markets show where smart money is flowing. Kalshi requires KYC and operates under US regulations, while Polymarket offers global access with crypto.

items.name: Kalshi - NFL Championship
items.why: Real-money contracts, $25M+ volume, institutional participation. Chiefs 28¢, Ravens 22¢, 49ers 18¢ as of Jan 10.

items.name: Polymarket - Super Bowl LIX
items.why: Global liquidity pool, $40M+ volume, faster price discovery. Chiefs 32%, Ravens 24%, 49ers 16% implied probability.

blocks.markdown: AFC and NFC conference winner markets show divergence between platforms. Arbitrage opportunities exist when spreads exceed 3-5%.

blocks.text: Markets move fast after injury reports and practice updates. Kalshi tends to lag Polymarket by 15-30 minutes due to lower liquidity.

blocks.markdown: **Kalshi advantages:** US legal, FDIC-insured deposits, tax reporting, lower fees (2% vs 2-3%). **Polymarket advantages:** Higher liquidity, global access, faster price discovery, more granular markets.

blocks.text: Institutional money flows to Kalshi. Retail/crypto flows to Polymarket. Watch for divergence when institutional sentiment differs from retail.
